column2: Writing user input directly to an HTTP response allows for a cross-site scripting vulnerability.
column4: Cross-site scripting vulnerability due to a [["user-provided value"|"relative:///index.js:21:21:21:28"]].

column2: An HTTP request handler that performs expensive operations without restricting the rate at which operations can be carried out is vulnerable to denial-of-service attacks.
column4: This route handler performs [["a file system access"|"relative:///index.js:16:3:16:41"]], but is not rate-limited.
